thread.title: AWESOME! Alia Bhatt, Parineeti Chopra & Shraddha Kapoor In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel?
thread.title_full: AWESOME! Alia Bhatt, Parineeti Chopra & Shraddha Kapoor In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel?

title: AWESOME! Alia Bhatt, Parineeti Chopra & Shraddha Kapoor In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel?
text:
Posted by: Swikriti Srivastava Updated: Tuesday, October 20, 2015, 15:26 [IST] 
Hold your horses, before you jump into any conclusion as this is not at all the rumours but came directly through this actresses' mouth! Yes, the very chirpy actress, Alia Bhatt herself expressed her interest in the sequel of Dil Chahta Hai flick; if ever made, she wants to work in it with Shraddha Kapoor & Parineeti Chopra ."Parineeti, Shraddha and I should work in the sequel to â€˜Dil Chahta Hai' as three friends. I think that's a superb idea. It will be so much fun. Should I call Farhan regarding the film, and make it happen?" Alia Bhatt was quoted as saying to a leading daily. 
We do agree with you Alia, that it's indeed a mind-blowing idea and we wish sooner or later Farhan considers your amazing cast suggestion for Dil Chahta Hai sequel. SRK's Son Aryan Khan Spotted With Sister Suhana, Looks Too Hot In New Look! [PICS] Later, Alia also talked about her equation with her contemporaries(Parineeti & Shraddha). She said, "Both Pari and Shraddha are so talented, warm and beautiful. There is no need for me to exhibit a fake competitiveness, because it doesn't exist. I guess, it is just boring for the media to know that actresses aren't fighting any more (smiles)."It's nice to hear such wise words from Alia, isn't it? Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 1/10 Alia-Parineeti 
Alia Bhatt posing for the camera, along with Parineeti Chopra, behind the stage, in her glittery outfit and they both are looking super-pretty Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 2/10 Alia-Shraddha 
And here comes the super-hot picture of Alia Bhatt with Shraddha Kapoor, posing for the camera. Both of them can be seen in same black coloured outfits. Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 3/10 Sharing A Hug 
When Shraddha Kapoor & Parineeti Chopra spotted sharing a hug with each other at the special screening of Parineeti's flick, Kill Dil! 
Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 4/10 Alia Bhatt-Shraddha Kapoor 
Apart from acting, there is one more talent, which this duo (Alia & Shraddha) posses; singing! Both of them have sung a song for their films. Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 5/10 
In pics: Parineeti Chopra, Tabu, Priyanka Chopra & Alia Bhatt. Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 6/10 Magazine Photoshoot 
Alia Bhatt-Parineeti Chopra posing for the camera, along with Arjun Kapoor, Sidharth Malhotra, Ayushmaan Khurrana & Esha Gupta for a magzaine photoshoot. 
Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 7/10 At Ek Villain's Screening 
Parineeti Chopra & Shraddha Kapoor spotted in casuals, at the screening of Shraddha-Sidharth starrer flick, Ek Villain. Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 8/10 
This rare selfie of Alia Bhatt-Parineeti Chopra-Tabu-Priyanka Chopra, is too cute to handle! 
Alia, Parineeti & Shraddha In Dil Chahta Hai Sequel? 9/10 All Set For Shaandaar 
On the professional front, Alia is gearing up for Shaandaar , which is slated to be released this week on October 22, 2015. You might like
